00015 #include <cstdio>

00018 #include <Camgen/logging.h>
00019 #include <Camgen/pltscript.h>
00020 
00021 namespace Camorra
00022 {
00024 
00025     template<std::size_t M,std::size_t N>class multi_plot
00026     {
00027         public:
00028 
00030 
00031             std::string file;
00032 
00034 
00035             const char* terminal;
00036 
00038             
00039             std::string title;
00040 
00042 
00043             multi_plot(const std::string& file_,const char* term=NULL):file(file_),terminal(term)
00044             {
00045                 for(std::size_t i=0;i<M;++i)
00046                 {
00047                     for(std::size_t j=0;j<N;++j)
00048                     {
00049                         plots[i][j]=NULL;
00050                     }
00051                 }
00052             }
00053 
00055 
00056             void add_plot(plot_script* plt,std::size_t i,std::size_t j)
00057             {
00058                 if(i<M and j<N)
00059                 {
00060                     plots[i][j]=plt;
00061                 }
00062             }
00063 
00065 
00066             std::ostream& write(std::ostream& os) const
00067             {
00068                 if(terminal!=NULL)
00069                 {
00070                     std::string term(terminal);
00071                     std::string::iterator it=term.begin();
00072                     while(std::isalpha(*it) and it!=term.end())
00073                     {
00074                         ++it;
00075                     }
00076                     std::string file_ext=plot_script::file_extension(std::string(term.begin(),it));
00077                     if(file_ext.size()>0)
00078                     {
00079                         os<<"set terminal "<<term<<std::endl;
00080                         os<<"set output \""<<file<<'.'<<file_ext<<"\""<<std::endl;
00081                     }
00082                     else
00083                     {
00084                         os<<"set terminal table"<<std::endl;
00085                         os<<"set output \""<<file<<".dat"<<"\""<<std::endl;
00086                     }
00087                 }
00088                 os<<"set multiplot layout "<<M<<","<<N;
00089                 if(title.size()!=0)
00090                 {
00091                     os<<" title \""<<title<<"\"";
00092                 }
00093                 os<<std::endl;
00094                 double origin[2]={0,0};
00095                 double rowsize=(double)1/(double)M;
00096                 double colsize=(double)1/(double)N;
00097                 for(std::size_t m=0;m<M;++m)
00098                 {
00099                     origin[0]=0;
00100                     for(std::size_t n=0;n<N;++n)
00101                     {
00102                         if(plots[m][n]!=NULL)
00103                         {
00104                             os<<"set size "<<colsize<<","<<rowsize<<std::endl;
00105                             os<<"set origin "<<origin[0]<<","<<origin[1]<<std::endl;
00106                             plots[m][n]->write(os);
00107                             os<<std::endl;
00108                             plots[m][n]->reset(os);
00109                             os<<std::endl;
00110                         }
00111                         origin[0]+=colsize;
00112                     }
00113                     origin[1]+=rowsize;
00114                 }
00115                 return os;
00116             }
00117 
00119 
00120             bool write() const
00121             {
00122                 std::ofstream fs;
00123                 fs.open((file+".gp").c_str());
00124                 if(!fs.is_open())
00125                 {
00126                     LOG(warning)<<"Failed to open new file "<<file<<".gp...ignoring call."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00127                     return false;
00128                 }
00129                 write(fs);
00130                 fs.close();
00131                 return true;
00132             }
00133 
00135 
00136             bool plot() const
00137             {
00138 #ifdef GNUPLOTPATH
00139 #if defined(WIN32) || defined(_WIN32) || defined(__WIN32__) || defined(__TOS_WIN__)
00140 #define PIPE_OPEN _popen
00141 #define PIPE_CLOSE _pclose
00142 #elif defined(unix) || defined(__unix) || defined(__unix__) || defined(__APPLE__)
00143 #define PIPE_OPEN popen
00144 #define PIPE_CLOSE pclose
00145 #endif
00146                 FILE* gnustream=PIPE_OPEN(GNUPLOTPATH,"w");
00147                 if(gnustream==NULL)
00148                 {
00149                     LOG(warning)<<"Failed to open connection to gnuplot...proceeding by writing the script "<<file<<".gp..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00150                     return write();         
00151                 }
00152                 std::ostringstream ss;
00153                 write(ss);
00154                 std::fputs(ss.str().c_str(),gnustream);
00155                 if(PIPE_CLOSE(gnustream)==-1)
00156                 {
00157                     LOG(warning)<<"Closing connection to gnuplot failed..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00158                     return false;
00159                 }
00160                 return true;
00161 #undef PIPE_OPEN
00162 #undef PIPE_CLOSE
00163 #else
00164                 return write();
00165 #endif
00166             }
00167 
00168         private:
00169 
00170             plot_script* plots[M][N];
00171     };
00172 }

00174 #endif /*MULTIPLOT_H_*/
